summary: This mod adds a healer to every Imperial and Stormcloak camp.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a healer to every Imperial and Stormcloak camp in Skyrim. These healers will be near the Alchemy Lab at the camp and will sell you healing potions and ingredients to create healing potions and healing recipes. Also check out my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76485?]Civil War Quartermasters[/url] mod. If you are using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77142/?]Civil War Commanders[/url] do not use Civil War Healers since Civil War Healers is built into [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77142/?]Civil War Commanders[/url]. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1026/?]here[/url]

Requirements
Skyrim

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin into your data folder
author: LegoManIAm94
